extendedInfo.description: WePota - Quality Of Life !! This is New Generation Social Network. Not only allow share status, photos. We Also allow you share your report. Not only allow write Pots(report) for Foods and Restaurant,Which movie you suggest for your friends, which kind of skin product is awesome. you can even tell your friend which club is special. WePota show 3 level of average mark for each item.1) Sync Mark:- Calculate only people you add to your rings.2) Out-Sync Mark- Calculate people who in your rings and in your friend's ring.3) Public- Calculate every one.Extra Function:Share your pota(reviews) to Facebook, Twitter, whatsapp, wechat, tango etc.Comment and Suggestionï¼cs@dumpsoft.comtag: Information, Share, Friends, Food Movie Music Electronic Technology Reviews, News
